 2012-16432012-12-06CIC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) improve the economic outcomes of principal applicants accepted in the Federal Skilled Worker Class, by selecting candidates who will be able to integrate more rapidly and successfully into the Canadian economy, and by increasing the integrity and labour market responsiveness of the Arranged Employment factor; (2) meet Canada's skilled labour needs by reducing barriers to the immigration of skilled tradespersons; and (3) make permanent residence more accessible to skilled workers who have demonstrated an ability to integrate into the Canadian labour market.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0274 Publication Date: 2012-12-19
AttachmentsAttachment
